title: Bank Tells Laid-Off Employees to Remain On-Call For Two Years For Free
text:
Bank Tells Laid-Off Employees to Remain On-Call For Two Years For Free 
Published By: Gawker.com - Today 
SunTrust Bank (market value: $21 billion) is currently laying off full-time IT workers and outsourcing their jobs overseas. The bank does re...
